name: Arcgis Services - DGRM
description: Catalog of ArcGIS REST services provided by the Portuguese Directorate-General for Natural Resources, Safety and Maritime Services (DGRM). These services offer geospatial data related to marine, environmental and regulatory topics.
owner_name: Direçao Geral de Recursos Naturais, Segurança e Serviços Maritimos (DGRM)
